# Ternary
## Case: Gapminder

***

# Load the data [Ingest]


```{r, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, echo=TRUE, class.source = 'fold-hide'}

df <- read.csv("archetypes/gapminder/gapminder-all-years.csv", header = TRUE, stringsAsFactors = FALSE)
df

```

# Prepare the data [Wrangle]

```{r, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, echo=TRUE, class.source = 'fold-hide'}

# Enrich with continent using country code
df$continent <- countrycode(df$country_code, origin = 'iso3c', destination = 'continent')

# Filter for single year
gapminder <- filter(df, year == 2020)

# Remove cases with NA
gapminder <- gapminder[complete.cases(gapminder), ]

# Rescale 0 to 100
gapminder$gdp <- rescale(gapminder$gdp, to=c(0,100))
gapminder$lex <- rescale(gapminder$lex, to=c(0,100))
gapminder$pop <- rescale(gapminder$pop, to=c(0,100))

gapminder

```

# Plot

```{r, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, echo=TRUE, class.source = 'fold-hide', fig.width=12, fig.height=12, out.width = "100%"}

continent_palette <- c("Africa" = "#77dff7", "Americas" = "#b5ea32", "Asia" = "#ff5973", "Europe" = "#ffe800", "Oceania" = "#ff5973")

theme_opts <- theme(
  legend.position = "none",
  legend.title = element_blank(),
  tern.axis.title.L = element_text(hjust = 0.5),
  tern.axis.title.R = element_text(hjust = 0.5),
  panel.background = element_blank(),
  panel.border = element_blank(),
  plot.background = element_blank(),
  plot.margin = unit(c(0, 0, 0, 0), "in")
)

v1 <- ggtern(data=gapminder, aes(gdp, lex, pop)) + 
  geom_point(aes(color = continent), size = 2.5, alpha=.6) + 
  scale_color_manual(values = continent_palette) +
  coord_tern() +
  theme_minimal() +
  theme_nomask() +
  theme_opts +
  labs(title = "Gapminder", 
           subtitle = "2020") +
           xlab("gdp") + 
           ylab("life expectancy") +
           zlab("population")

v1

```
